items.sentence: Tom and Mary are having a barbecue next weekend.
How were you persuaded to join the search party?
Tom will probably be the last to get here today.
Tom will probably be in Boston for three months.
Tom will probably be too scared to say anything.
Tom will probably be able to do that eventually.
If there's anything else you need, just text me.
I'll help you when I've finished what I'm doing.
I've been living in this house for thirty years.
Thanks for always being there when I needed you.
Tom walked slowly down the road, using his cane.
Tom would be disappointed if you didn't do that.
I don't think Tom would mind doing that for you.
I doubt Tom will ever forgive me for doing that.
Tom didn't know that Mary was in love with John.
Tom broke up with Mary and started dating Alice.
Tom told Mary that he didn't think John was mad.
Doing that was more complicated than I expected.
Did you know my parents before they got married?
Tom told me that he stopped going to the doctor.
